Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey and red in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393784) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393784)
